tasks.start-windows: deno task tailwind-win & deno run -A --watch=static/,routes/ dev.ts
tasks.start-linux: deno task tailwind-lin & deno run -A --watch=static/,routes/ dev.ts
tasks.gen-client: rm -rf ./generated && deno run -A npm:@openapitools/openapi-generator-cli generate -i ../Meowmed+_REST.yaml -g typescript --additional-properties=platform=deno,supportsES6=true,disallowAdditionalPropertiesIfNotPresent=false -t ./templates -o ./generated
